alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Inland Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued April 04 at 2:58AM PDT until April 04 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 30 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire and San Diego County Valleys. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Not quite as cold for late tonight into early Wednesday morning, but still cold enough for patchy frost in colder, wind-sheltered locations.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Inland Valleys
